document_data.name: N'Vaelahr
document_data.mainbody: The '''N'Vaelahr''' ([[Elven (language)|elven]] for '''Shadow Soldiers''') was the covert branch of the [[Akh'Velahr]] military in the [[elf|elven]] empire of [[Cormanthyr]] that existed up until the fall of [[Myth Drannor]] at the close of the [[Weeping War]].
document_data.Notable Akh'Faern:
* [[Aolis Ildacer]], First Shadow
* [[Amara Ildacer]], Second Shadow
* [[Ualair]], secret Master
* [[Parthar]], a [[gnome]] agent transformed into a [[yugoloth]] to act as spy
